comment: Modern is already not enforcing their IP. AZ and Moderna are totally separate kinds of technology. It's like the difference between a car and a house. You can't use a car factory to make houses.
amr:
# ::snt Modern is already not enforcing their IP. AZ and Moderna are totally separate kinds of technology. It's like the difference between a car and a house. You can't use a car factory to make houses.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / enforce-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (m2 / modern)
            :ARG1 (ii / IP
                  :poss m2)
            :time (a / already))
      :snt2 (t / technology
            :mod (k / kind)
            :ARG1-of (s / separate-02
                  :degree (t2 / total))
            :domain (a2 / and
                  :op1 (c / company
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "AZ"))
                  :op2 (c2 / company
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Modern_1"))))
      :snt3 (r / resemble-01
            :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
            :ARG2 (d / differ-02
                  :ARG1 (c3 / car)
                  :ARG2 (h / house)))
      :snt4 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (f / factory
                        :mod (c4 / car))
                  :ARG2 (m3 / make-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (h2 / house)))))

comment: I stand corrected. I'm glad to hear that is allowing other countries like to manufacture their Covid vaccine.
